projects.title: Real-time NER of Reddit Comments
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Python application with Reddit Python SDK to stream subreddit comments and push to Kafka. 
 - Used PySpark’s streaming feature to filter named entities from topic comments using spacy and push to LogStash. 
 - Created dashboard for visualization of the named entities in Kibana to analyze the trends in that subreddit.

projects.title: Automatic Email label
projects.bodyText:
- Created email classification system using decision tree classifier with Accuracy of 88%. 
 - Integrated ChatGPT for unknown labeling. 
 - Integrated the results with react frontend and backend in Python Flask, utilized JWT for authentication and MongoDB for storage. 
 - Containerized the modules and created docker images, docker compose setup for easy deployment.

projects.title: Enhanced K-mean with Automated k estimation and Outlier Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an automated Elbow Method for optimal K estimation.
 - Implemented Naïve-Sharding to accelerate convergence.
 - Built an auto-encoder neural network for detecting outliers.

projects.title: Live Stock Market Prediction
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a LSTM model for stock market analysis using Yahoo time series data. 
 - Utilized Yahoo API to stream live stock data to Kafka topic for real-time prediction and training. 
 - Utilized Matplotlib to visualize the actual and predicted stock values obtained from the LSTM model for stock market analysis. 
 - The LSTM model not only analyzes historical data but also adapts to real-time market fluctuations for accurate predictions.

projects.title: Pothole Detection and Mapping Android Application
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an android application that detects the presence of potholes using Inception V3 and Transfer Learning.
 - Plotted the location of the detected potholes in Google maps.
 - The android application can also notify the local authorities.

projects.title: Movie Search Engine
projects.bodyText:
- Enhanced the user experience with a user-friendly movie search interface. 
 - Designed an interface for movie searches.
 - Developed a movie search engine using plot summaries. 
 - Utilized NLTK for stop-word removal and named entity recognition. 
 - Implemented Tf-Idf and Cosine Similarity algorithms via MapReduce to determine Document Correlation.

projects.title: Encrypted File System
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and implemented an encrypted file system in Java using SHA256 hashing for password validation, encryption of file chunks, and HMAC generation for data integrity. 
 - Optimized file operations for efficient read/write performance and encryption/decryption.

projects.title: Covid-19 preventive measures
projects.bodyText:
-  integrated a CNN based on Mobile Net V2 architecture to accurately detect the presence of a face mask. 
 - Achieved 96% test accuracy. 
 - Deployed a contact less temperature sensor to measure the body temperature.

projects.title: IoT and Digital Image Processing Based Parking System
projects.bodyText: - A website based parking system which allows user to book parking slot in advance along with vehicle number plate detection for security.

projects.title: Designed a database for a delivery system
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a complete database for the door dash delivery application from scratch and implemented in Oracle 19c .
 - Involved in requirements gathering and modeling the application to a real-world scenario, drawing ER diagram, relational model.

projects.title: Building Linear Models
projects.bodyText: - Developed a linear model to analyze the relationship between PSA (Serum Prostate-Specific Antigen) levels and quantitative predictors.
